programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.longDescription: Classic whodunnit starring Agatha Christie's favourite female sleuth. As her peers fade into their twilight years, Marple keeps on deducing the truth behind murderous crimes.
programme.description: Join Marple and a host of famous faces in this classic whodunnit

titles.contentInfo: S1, E1. The Body in the Library
titles.description: Miss Marple investigates the death of a young dancer in the library of Gossington Hall.
titles.guidance: Contains violence, moderate language and scenes that some viewers may find distressing
titles.longDescription: Miss Marple is called by an old friend to help discover who strangled a young dancer in the library of Gossington Hall.

titles.contentInfo: S1, E2. The Murder at the Vicarage
titles.description: A man disliked by everyone in his village is found dead in the local vicarage's study.
titles.longDescription: Colonel Protheroe is intensely disliked, but when he is found slumped over the desk in a vicarage study, Miss Marple must unpick the truth.

titles.description: An old friend of Miss Marple sees a woman on a train being strangled.
titles.longDescription: When Elspeth McGillicuddy sees a woman on a train being strangled, the authorities think that she has been dreaming, but Miss Marple knows better...

titles.contentInfo: S1, E4. A Murder Is Announced
titles.description: Zoë Wanamaker guest stars as Miss Marple sets about uncovering a village's dark secrets.
titles.longDescription: Zoë Wanamaker guest stars when Miss Marple sets about uncovering a village's dark secrets, following the announcement of a murder in the personal columns of a local paper.

titles.description: Ghostly apparitions lead Miss Marple to an unsolved murder.
titles.guidance: Violence and the aftermath of violence.
titles.longDescription: When Gwenda Halliday moves in to the home of her dreams, she begins to see ghostly apparitions which leads Miss Marple to an unsolved murder.

titles.description: In the town of Lymstock an outbreak of anonymous hate mail results in a woman's suicide.
titles.longDescription: In the town of Lymstock an outbreak of anonymous hate mail results in a woman's suicide. As the letters become even more deadly, the village is thrown into turmoil.

titles.contentInfo: S2, E3. By the Pricking of My Thumbs
titles.description: Tommy and Tuppence enlist Miss Marple's help when their elderly aunt dies suddenly.
titles.episodeTitle: By the Pricking of My Thumbs
titles.longDescription: Tommy and Tuppence enlist Miss Marple's help when their elderly aunt dies suddenly and a friend of the dead woman goes missing.

titles.description: Miss Marple takes refuge at a house where a ouija board predicts the death of the owner.
titles.longDescription: Miss Marple visits a house in Devon - when an Ouija board accurately predicts the demise of the house's owner, she must work out the cause of death.

titles.description: When a maid at Bertram's Hotel is murdered, Miss Marple investigates.
titles.guidance: Use of racially discriminatory language. Moderate crime scene images.
titles.longDescription: Miss Marple arrives at Bertram's Hotel to find that there are secrets lurking there. When a maid is murdered, things take an even more sinister turn.

titles.description: Miss Marple meets a family coming to terms with the wrongful hanging of their brother.
titles.longDescription: Miss Marple is invited to a wedding, and finds a house full of secrets as well as a family coming to terms with the wrongful hanging of their brother.

titles.description: Miss Marple's holiday is interrupted by the mysterious death of one of her fellow guests.
titles.guidance: Contains occasional use of moderate language and crime scene gore.
titles.longDescription: When her holiday at a friend's coastal villa is interrupted by the mysterious death of one of her fellow guests, hours after he had told a ghostly tale, Miss Marple investigates.

titles.description: Miss Marple goes on a mystery coach tour with a number of intriguing passengers.
titles.guidance: Contains peril and some mild swearing.
titles.longDescription: After receiving instructions from a recently deceased friend, Miss Marple finds herself on a mystery coach tour with her nephew Raymond and some intriguing passengers.

titles.contentInfo: S4, E1. A Pocket Full of Rye
titles.description: When a business magnate is killed, the circumstances of his death recall a nursery rhyme.
titles.guidance: Contains sexual scenes and some use of moderate language
titles.longDescription: When a business magnate is killed, Miss Marple realises the circumstances of his death recall a nursery rhyme - but what does it mean?

titles.description: Benedict Cumberbatch joins Miss Marple to investigate unexpected deaths in a village.
titles.guidance: Contains some moderate crime scene images.
titles.longDescription: Benedict Cumberbatch guest stars as detective Luke Fitzwilliam and joins Miss Marple to investigate unexpected deaths in the village of Wychwood-under-Ashe.

titles.contentInfo: S4, E3. They Do It with Mirrors
titles.description: Joan Collins plays Miss Marple's crime-busting chum Ruth for a showy investigation.
titles.guidance: Contains bloody crime scenes, violence and some moderate language.
titles.longDescription: Joan Collins plays Miss Marple's crime-busting chum Ruth Van Rydock to help dig deeper into a murder that takes place during a rehearsal of an amateur stage show.

titles.contentInfo: S4, E4. Why Didn't They Ask Evans?
titles.description: Rafe Spall plays a distracting piano teacher as Miss Marple unpicks a series of murders.
titles.guidance: Contains the aftermath of violent crimes, moderate language and scenes some viewers may find upsetting.
titles.longDescription: Rafe Spall plays a distracting piano teacher as supersleuth Miss Marple digs into the devastating truth behind a series of murders - and a dying man's enigmatic last words.

titles.description: Marple investigates an inn run by witches who claim to be able to kill by black magic.
titles.guidance: Contains pagan and occult rituals, crime scenes and moderate language.
titles.longDescription: After a friend is murdered, Miss Marple vows to seek justice. A clue leads her to an inn run by modern-day witches who claim to be able to kill by black magic.

titles.contentInfo: S5, E2. The Secret of Chimneys
titles.description: Ruth Jones plays a curious guest at a stately home. Which secret will Miss Marple uncover?
titles.longDescription: Ruth Jones plays an intriguing guest of the host of a country estate. When someone is killed at the stately home, Miss Marple discovers a coded message and a dark secret.

titles.description: Did a woman really die of shock when the geranium in her wallpaper turned blue?
titles.longDescription: Did a woman really die of shock when the geranium in her wallpaper turned blue? Can Marple stop a trial before the wrong person is found guilty of murder?

titles.contentInfo: S5, E4. The Mirror Crack'd from Side to Side
titles.description: Joanna Lumley is Miss Marple's friend Dolly Bantry, who attends a fateful Hollywood party.
titles.episodeTitle: The Mirror Crack'd from Side to Side
titles.longDescription: Joanna Lumley is Miss Marple's friend Dolly Bantry, who attends a fateful Hollywood party. When a fan dies after drinking a poisoned cocktail, our sleuth wonders if was planned.

titles.description: While holidaying on the island of St Honore, Miss Marple is drawn into a web of deceit.
titles.longDescription: While holidaying on a Caribbean island, Miss Marple is drawn into a web of deceit and death, and with the help of a tycoon, sets to work unravelling the truth.

titles.description: Miss Marple helps a family friend seek refuge at a house known as Greenshaw's Folly.
titles.guidance: Contains violence, crime scene gore and moderate language.
titles.longDescription: Miss Marple helps a friend seek refuge at Greenshaw's Folly. But a shadow soon begins to fall over the various inhabitants living there.

titles.description: While staying with a recently widowed friend, Miss Marple meets a charming young drifter.
titles.guidance: Violent & sexual content. Scenes viewers may find upsetting.
titles.longDescription: While staying with a recently widowed friend, Miss Marple meets charming young drifter Mike Rogers. Then events take a sinister turn when a dangerous killer strikes.
